meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by ankylosis.
meanings.sent1: The ankylotic joint was stiff and immobile.
meanings.sent2: Her ankylotic knee made it hard for her to bend her leg.
meanings.sent3: The ankylotic door handle wouldn't turn, trapping us inside!
meanings.sent4: The ankylotic vines wrapped tightly around the tree, holding it in place.
meanings.sent5: The ankylotic fingers of the statue seemed frozen in time.

meanings.sent1: The ankylotic disease led to the fusion of the bones.
meanings.sent2: The ankylotic medication helped reduce inflammation in the joints.
meanings.sent3: The ankylotic dance moves were so rigid, it looked like a robot!
meanings.sent4: The ankylotic silence in the room was broken only by the ticking of the clock.
meanings.sent5: The ankylotic grip of winter froze everything in its path.
